actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Air Force to include the Modular Airborne Fire Fighting System mission as part of the basing criteria of the Air Force for C-130J aircraft for the Air National Guard.
short_title: Modernizing Aerial Fire Fighting Support (MAFFS) for the National Guard Act

summary.text:
Modernizing Aerial Fire Fighting Support (MAFFS) for the National Guard Act

This bill requires the Department of the Air Force to include the Modular Airborne Fire Fighting System mission as part of its basing criteria for C-130J aircraft for the Air National Guard.

titles.title: Modernizing Aerial Fire Fighting Support (MAFFS) for the National Guard Act
Modernizing Aerial Fire Fighting Support (MAFFS) for the National Guard Act

A bill to require the Secretary of the Air Force to include the Modular Airborne Fire Fighting System mission as part of the basing criteria of the Air Force for C-130J aircraft for the Air National Guard.
